Package org.neo4j.harness

Interface Neo4j

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InProcessNeo4j
    public interface Neo4j
extends AutoCloseable
    Neo4j test instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      URI boltURI()
      Returns the URI to the Bolt Protocol connector of the instance.
      void close()
      Shutdown neo4j test instance.
      Configuration config()
      Returns the server's configuration.
      DatabaseManagementService databaseManagementService()
      Access the DatabaseManagementService used by the server.
      GraphDatabaseService defaultDatabaseService()
      Access default database service.
      URI httpsURI()
      Returns ths URI to the root resource of the instance using the https protocol.
      URI httpURI()
      Returns the URI to the root resource of the instance.
      void printLogs​(PrintStream out)
      Prints logs to the specified print stream if log is available.

    • Method Detail

      • boltURI

        URI boltURI()
        Returns the URI to the Bolt Protocol connector of the instance.
        Returns:
        the bolt address.

      • httpURI

        URI httpURI()
        Returns the URI to the root resource of the instance. For example, http://localhost:7474/
        Returns:
        the http address to the root resource.

      • httpsURI

        URI httpsURI()
        Returns ths URI to the root resource of the instance using the https protocol. For example, https://localhost:7475/.
        Returns:
        the https address to the root resource.

      • databaseManagementService

        DatabaseManagementService databaseManagementService()
        Access the DatabaseManagementService used by the server.
        Returns:
        the database management service backing this instance.

      • defaultDatabaseService

        GraphDatabaseService defaultDatabaseService()
        Access default database service.
        Returns:
        default database service.

      • config

        Configuration config()
        Returns the server's configuration.
        Returns:
        the current configuration of the instance.

      • printLogs

        void printLogs​(PrintStream out)
        Prints logs to the specified print stream if log is available.
        Parameters:
        out - the stream to print to.

      • close

        void close()
        Shutdown neo4j test instance.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
